## Behavioral and accounting equations
### Exogenous variables

| Parameter | Description | Region |
|-----------|-------------|--------|
| $\theta$ | Tax rate | Global |
| $\alpha_0$ | Autonomous consumption | Global |
| $\alpha_1^E$ | Propensity to consume out of wages | East |
| $\alpha_1^W$ | Propensity to consume out of wages | West |
| $\alpha_2^E$ | Propensity to consume out of transfer payments | East |
| $\alpha_3^E$ | Propensity to consume out of net worth | East |
| $\alpha_3^W$ | Propensity to consume out of net worth | West |
| $\delta$ | Depreciation rate | Global |
| $k$ | Target capital-output ratio | Global |
| $\gamma$ | Adjustment parameter towards target capital stock | Global |
| $\mu^E$ | Import propensity | East |
| $\mu^W$ | Import propensity | West |
| $\beta$ | Transfer rate on wages | Global |
| $G^E$ | Government expenditure | East |
| $G^W$ | Government expenditure | West |
| $r_d$ | Interest rate on deposits | Global |
| $r_b$ | Interest rate on bonds | Global |

### Consumption
$$ C^E = \alpha_0 + (1-\theta)(\alpha_1^E \cdot WB^E + \alpha_3^E \cdot R^E) \tag{1}$$

$$ C^W = \alpha_0 + (1-\theta)[\alpha_1^W \cdot WB^W + \alpha_2^W \cdot NT + \alpha_3^W \cdot (+r_{-1}·ME_{-1} + r_{-1}·BE_{-1})] \tag{2} $$

### Capital Investment

$$AF^E = \delta \cdot K^E_{-1} \tag{3}$$

$$AF^W = \delta \cdot K^W_{-1} \tag{4}$$

$$K^T_E = k \cdot Y^E_{-1} \tag{5}$$

$$K^T_W = k \cdot Y^W_{-1} \tag{6}$$

$$I^E = \gamma \cdot (K^T_E - K^E_{-1}) + AF^E \tag{7}$$

$$I^W = \gamma \cdot (K^T_W - K^W_{-1}) + AF^W \tag{8}$$

$$K^E = K^E_{-1} + I^E - AF^E \tag{9}$$

$$K^W = K^W_{-1} + I^W - AF^W \tag{10}$$


### Trade and transfers

$$IM^E = \mu^E \cdot Y^E \cdot (1-\theta) \tag{11}$$

$$IM^W = \mu^W \cdot Y^W \cdot (1-\theta) \tag{12}$$

$$X^E = IM^W \tag{13}$$

$$X^W = IM^E \tag{14}$$

$$NT = WB^E \cdot \beta \tag{15}$$

### Interest payments


### Government
$$Y^E = C^E + I^E + G^E + X^E - IM^E \tag{16}$$

$$Y^W = C^W + I^W + G^W + X^W - IM^W \tag{17}$$

$$T^E = Y^E \cdot \theta \tag{18}$$

$$T^W = Y^W \cdot \theta \tag{19}$$
